targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  p.product_good as "Product",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE t.status = 'COMPLETED') as "Completed",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE t.status IN ('READY', 'ASSIGNED', 'EXECUTING')) as "Active",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE t.status = 'PENDING') as "Pending",
  COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE t.task_type = 'COLLECT_SELL' AND t.good = p.product_good AND t.status = 'COMPLETED') as "Final Collections"
FROM manufacturing_pipelines p
LEFT JOIN manufacturing_tasks t ON p.id = t.pipeline_id
WHERE p.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCELLED')
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
GROUP BY p.id, p.product_good
ORDER BY COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE t.status IN ('READY', 'ASSIGNED', 'EXECUTING')) DESC

SELECT p.product_good as "Product", p.status as "Status", p.sell_market as "Sell Market", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id) as "Tasks", (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.status = 'COMPLETED') as "Done", ROUND((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.status = 'COMPLETED')::numeric / NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id), 0) * 100) as "Progress", (SELECT string_agg(DISTINCT t.assigned_ship, ', ') FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.assigned_ship IS NOT NULL) as "Ships" FROM manufacturing_pipelines p WHERE p.player_id = 12 AND p.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCELLED') AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%') ORDER BY p.product_good

SELECT p.product_good as "Pipeline", t.task_type as "Task", t.good as "Good", t.status as "Status", COALESCE(t.assigned_ship, '-') as "Ship", t.source_market as "Source", COALESCE(t.target_market, t.factory_symbol) as "Target", CASE WHEN t.started_at IS NOT NULL THEN EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (COALESCE(t.completed_at, NOW()) - t.started_at))::int || 's' ELSE '-' END as "Duration" FROM manufacturing_tasks t JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id WHERE t.player_id = 12 AND t.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED') AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%') ORDER BY p.product_good, CASE t.task_type WHEN 'ACQUIRE_DELIVER' THEN 1 WHEN 'COLLECT_SELL' THEN 2 ELSE 3 END, t.good

panels.title: Pipeline Tasks Breakdown (grouped by Pipeline â†’ Task Type)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  SUBSTRING(p.id, 1, 8) as "Pipeline ID",
  p.product_good as "Product",
  p.status as "Status",
  p.sell_market as "Sell Market",
  p.expected_price as "Expected Price",
  p.total_cost as "Cost",
  p.total_revenue as "Revenue",
  p.net_profit as "Profit",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id) as "Total Tasks",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.status = 'COMPLETED') as "Completed",
  (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.status IN ('ASSIGNED', 'EXECUTING')) as "Running",
  ROUND(
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id AND t.status = 'COMPLETED')::numeric /
    NULLIF((SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_tasks t WHERE t.pipeline_id = p.id), 0) * 100
  ) as "Progress %"
FROM manufacturing_pipelines p
WHERE p.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'CANCELLED')
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

SELECT
  SUBSTRING(t.pipeline_id, 1, 8) as "Pipeline",
  p.product_good as "Product",
  t.task_type as "Task Type",
  t.status as "Status",
  t.good as "Good",
  t.assigned_ship as "Ship",
  t.source_market as "Source",
  COALESCE(t.target_market, t.factory_symbol) as "Destination",
  t.actual_quantity as "Qty",
  t.retry_count as "Retries",
  CASE
    WHEN t.started_at IS NOT NULL THEN
      EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (COALESCE(t.completed_at, NOW()) - t.started_at))::int
    ELSE NULL
  END as "Duration (s)"
FROM manufacturing_tasks t
LEFT JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id
WHERE t.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED')
  AND t.pipeline_id IS NOT NULL
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY p.product_good, t.task_type, t.created_at

SELECT
  t.assigned_ship as "Ship",
  t.task_type as "Task Type",
  t.status as "Status",
  t.good as "Good",
  t.source_market as "Source",
  COALESCE(t.target_market, t.factory_symbol) as "Destination",
  t.actual_quantity as "Quantity",
  p.product_good as "Pipeline Product",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - t.started_at))::int as "Duration (s)"
FROM manufacturing_tasks t
LEFT JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id
WHERE t.assigned_ship IS NOT NULL
  AND t.status IN ('ASSIGNED', 'EXECUTING')
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY t.started_at DESC

SELECT
  t.task_type as "Task Type",
  t.good as "Good",
  t.status as "Status",
  p.product_good as "Pipeline Product",
  EXTRACT(EPOCH FROM (NOW() - t.created_at))::int as "Age (s)",
  t.retry_count as "Retries",
  t.error_message as "Last Error"
FROM manufacturing_tasks t
LEFT JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id
WHERE t.status IN ('PENDING', 'READY')
  AND t.pipeline_id IS NOT NULL
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY t.created_at ASC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  t.task_type as "Task Type",
  t.good as "Good",
  t.retry_count as "Retries",
  t.max_retries as "Max",
  p.product_good as "Pipeline Product",
  LEFT(t.error_message, 60) as "Error",
  t.completed_at as "Failed At"
FROM manufacturing_tasks t
LEFT JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id
WHERE t.status = 'FAILED'
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY t.completed_at DESC
LIMIT 15

SELECT
  p.product_good as "Product",
  p.status as "Status",
  p.total_cost as "Total Cost",
  p.total_revenue as "Revenue",
  p.net_profit as "Net Profit",
  CASE
    WHEN p.total_cost > 0 THEN ROUND((p.net_profit::numeric / p.total_cost) * 100, 1)
    ELSE 0
  END as "ROI %"
FROM manufacturing_pipelines p
WHERE (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
ORDER BY p.net_profit DESC
LIMIT 20

SELECT
  t.task_type as "Task Type",
  SUM(t.total_cost) as "Total Cost"
FROM manufacturing_tasks t
JOIN manufacturing_pipelines p ON t.pipeline_id = p.id
WHERE t.total_cost > 0
  AND (p.sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
GROUP BY t.task_type

SELECT
  product_good as "Product",
  SUM(net_profit) as "Net Profit"
FROM manufacturing_pipelines
WHERE net_profit != 0
  AND (sell_market LIKE '${system}%' OR construction_site LIKE '${system}%')
GROUP BY product_good
ORDER BY SUM(net_profit) DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_pipelines
WHERE pipeline_type = 'CONSTRUCTION'
  AND status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCELLED')
  AND construction_site LIKE '${system}%'

SELECT
  COALESCE(ROUND(
    (SUM((m->>'deliveredQuantity')::int)::float /
     NULLIF(SUM((m->>'targetQuantity')::int), 0) * 100)
  ), 0) as progress
FROM manufacturing_pipelines p,
     jsonb_array_elements(p.materials) m
WHERE p.pipeline_type = 'CONSTRUCTION'
  AND p.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCELLED')
  AND p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%'

SELECT
  p.construction_site as "Site",
  m->>'tradeSymbol' as "Material",
  (m->>'targetQuantity')::int as "Required",
  (m->>'deliveredQuantity')::int as "Delivered",
  ROUND(((m->>'deliveredQuantity')::float /
         NULLIF((m->>'targetQuantity')::int, 0)) * 100) as "Progress %"
FROM manufacturing_pipelines p,
     jsonb_array_elements(p.materials) m
WHERE p.pipeline_type = 'CONSTRUCTION'
  AND p.status NOT IN ('COMPLETED', 'FAILED', 'CANCELLED')
  AND p.construction_site LIKE '${system}%'
ORDER BY p.construction_site, m->>'tradeSymbol'

list.definition: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(sell_market, 1, POSITION('-' IN SUBSTRING(sell_market, 4)) + 2) as system FROM manufacturing_pipelines WHERE sell_market IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(construction_site, 1, POSITION('-' IN SUBSTRING(construction_site, 4)) + 2) FROM manufacturing_pipelines WHERE construction_site IS NOT NULL ORDER BY system
list.label: System
list.name: system
list.query: SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(sell_market, 1, POSITION('-' IN SUBSTRING(sell_market, 4)) + 2) as system FROM manufacturing_pipelines WHERE sell_market IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT DISTINCT SUBSTRING(construction_site, 1, POSITION('-' IN SUBSTRING(construction_site, 4)) + 2) FROM manufacturing_pipelines WHERE construction_site IS NOT NULL ORDER BY system
